{"id":963331224,"question_id":2785,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1685846527,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/963331224/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Semi-Ordered Permutation","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int semiOrderedPermutation(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int op=0;\n        \n        if(nums[0]==1 && nums[len-1]==len )\n            return op;\n        \n        boolean flag = false;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            if(nums[i]==1){\n                op+=i;\n                flag = true;\n            }\n                \n            \n            if(nums[i]==len){\n                \n                op+=len-i-1;\n                if(!flag)\n                    op-=1;\n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        return op;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"semi-ordered-permutation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
